title: 2004년 Atencio 사건
summary: 미국 Florida, FL 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Atencio. 판결일: 2004-06-09. 법원: District Court of Appeal of Florida.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Moises ATENCIO v. STATE of Florida
**판결일**: 2004-06-09
**법원**: District Court of Appeal of Florida
**관할**: Florida, FL

**판사**: Cope, Fletcher, Ramirez

## 변호인

Bennett H. Brummer, Public Defender and Todd G. Scher, Special Assistant Public Defender, for appellant., Charles J. Crist, Jr., Attorney General, and Jill K. Traína, Assistant Attorney General, for appellee.

## 인용

- 874 So. 2d 727

## 판결문 요약


PER CURIAM.
Moisés Atencio appeals from his conviction and sentence for the armed manslaughter of Vladimir Mazo and for aggravated assault on Isaac Argules. After a careful review of the record, we find no reversible error below.
Affirmed.
...
